Septuagesimae] Responsorium: [Dixit dominus deus] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 non est bonum esse hominem solum\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can 006473); Verse: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Ade uero non inueniebatur adiuto\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can 006473a); Lectio aus Mt 20,1: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Secundum Matheum\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Lectio VII. In illo tempore dixit ihesus discipulis suis parabolam hanc. Simile est regnum celorum homini patri familias qui exiit primo mane conducere operarios in\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, bricht ab; \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (1rb) Lectio aus Gregorius Magnus: Homilia in evangelia lib. 1, homilia 19: von [brevita]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 te perstringere ne uos et extensa processio\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 bis \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 uineam suam operarios conducit\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ; Gn 2,21: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 In illo tempore misit dominus saporem in adam et tulit unam de cotis eius et edificauit costam quam tulerat de Adam,\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 brich ab; \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (1va) Lectio aus Sedulius Scotus: In euangelium Matthaei vol. 2, lib. 3, cap. 20: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Lectio VIIIa. Quis uero patris familias similitudinem rectius tenet\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 bis \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 iusto usque ad ultimum electum qui\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ; \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (1vb) Versus: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Cherubin collocauit dominus\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can 006571a); Lectio aus Paschasius Radbertus: Expositio in Matheo, lib. 9: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Hic itaque pater familias ad extolendam\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 bis \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 ad finem ad erudiendam plebem fidelium\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ; \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (2ra) [f\u252 \'fcr Dom. 1 Quadragesimae] Hymn: [Sic corpus extra conteri dona per abstinen]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 tiam ieiuniet mens sobria a labe prorsus criminum\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20...-... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 ieiuniorum munera\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Amen\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can 008267c; AH 2 Nr.34); Versus: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Angelis suis deus mandauit\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can 007945); \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Ad matutinum\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. Antiphon: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Ecce nunc tempus acceptabile\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 bis \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 exhibeamus nos\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can 002532); \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (2rb) Oratio: [... fami]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 lie tue ut quod a te obtinere abstinendo nititur hoc bonis operibus exsequatur; Ad complendum\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. Responsorium: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 In pace in id ipsum\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can 006921); Versus: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Si dedero sompnium oculis meis\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can 006921a); Anweisung: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Hoc responsorium dicatum in sabbatis et in dominicis diebus et in festiuis in utroque completorio usque ad sabbatum ante dominicam in passione exslusiue. \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (2va) Hymn [Defensor noster aspice ...]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 nobis in te requies nocem bis corpore qui es defensor anime ad\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can 830070d; AH 27 Nr.75); \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (2vb) Antiphon (?): [...] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 factus es nobis sempiternus adiutor\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can 002742); Invitatorium. \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Non sit uobis uanum\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can 001110); Hymn: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Summe largitor praemii\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can 008398; AH 2 Nr.35).}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;} \uc1 \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs20 Conradus Holtnicker de Saxonia OM: Sermones de tempore \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (1ra) Sermo: von \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 admittit quia nullis precibus bis neque flectetur donis\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Schneyer 1, 748 Nr. 12 T3); \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (1ra-1va) Sermo: Dominica IIII. \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Ueniens ueniet et non tardabit\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Hab 2,3) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 quia antiqui vehementer desiderabant saluatoris aduentum\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 \u8230 \'85-... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 sic ergo viii modis uenit dominus et delisatis\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (?) (Schneyer 1, 749 Nr. 13 T3); \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (1va-b) Sermo: Dominica IIII. \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Ipse est qui post me uenturus est qui ante me factum est\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Io 1,27) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Ostenditur Christi uenientis humilitas\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20... bis\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 sicut atque eum mundus non recepit ita\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [...] (Schneyer 1, 749 Nr. 14 T4). Als Werk des Bonaventura in: Sancti Bonaventurae Opera. Tomus tertius. Sermones de tempore ac de sanctis, Lyon 1668, S. 15-17.}

\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Alleluia\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ; \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (1va) Antiphon: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Ascendit deus in iubilacione et dominus\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can 001490); {\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;} \uc1 \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs20 Medizinische Sammelhandschrift \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 121-1 \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs20 Joannitius: Isagoge ad Techne Galieni\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (1r) \u167 \'a71-11: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Incipit liber ysagogarum. Medicina diuiditur in duas partes scilicet in theoricam et practicam\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 bis \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Alia sunt\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [quae] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 propria\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [enixa]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 virtute tamen\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ; \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (1v) Besch\u228 \'e4digt, wohl \u167 \'a7 13-19 von \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 informat quae a se differunt\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 bis\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Citrinus solus significat\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [co]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 leram\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [r]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 ubeam\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 nig\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [er vero solus] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 nigram\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Rube\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [us]; \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 121-2 \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (1r-v) \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs20 Joannitius: Isagoge ad Techne Galieni\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. (1r Leimschaden): \u167 \'a7 87-100 - von\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 a corpore\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [...] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 virtus operatiua inutata triplex est aut enim\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 bis zum Ende des Werkes: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 quantitatis, temporis,ordinis, boni maliue discretio\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. (Edition: Gregor Maurach. Johannicius: Isagoge Ad Techne Galieni. Sudhoffs Archiv 62.2 (1978): 148-74, hier S. 151-155 und 174.); \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (1v) \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs20 Hippocrates: Prognosticon\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (\u252 \'fcbersetzt wohl von Constantinus Africanus oder Gerardus Cremonensis). Prolog, lib 1. \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Incipit liber prognosticorum. Omnis qui medicine artis studio s\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [eu gloriam] bis \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 signis siue solis cum predictis\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [...]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Bonum est egrum\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [...] (letzte drei Zeilen unklar). Auctor gradualis ita rationabiliter eundem ordinauit librum\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20..., \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Quid significat tractus. Tractus leticiam significantes duorum tantum temporum\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20..., \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Quid significet duplicatum offertorium. Duo offertoria qui initium habent offerentur\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20..., \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 De geminatione usus offertorii. Uersus offertorii Eructauit bifarie canitur cuius prima incisio designat paterni uerbi\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20...,\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Item de iteratione cantus. Aliqui cantus iteratione sua douocionem ueteris praeconi innuunt\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20.... \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (1va-b) Prolog. \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Incipit breuiarium per circulum anni. Sancti patres diuinitus inspirati ita diuinum ordinauerunt offitium\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20... \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (1vb) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Dom in aduentum domini ad vespera\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, mit nur kurzen Verweisen zu Ges\u228 \'e4nge f\u252 \'fcr Vesper, Completorium}

Audiens a domino Petrus quia diues difficile intraret\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20...-... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 ad exemplum apostolorum sua reliquerunt omnia\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, bricht ab. (Edition: CCSL 122). \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 125b \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (1r) [Teil zu Conversio Pauli.] Lectio aus Ionas Aurelianus: De institutione laicali, Lib. 3, cap. 1: von [...] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 de quibus hoc loco memoratur qui reliquerunt om[nia] et secuti sunt illum alius iudicator\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 bis \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 et dedistis mihi manducare sitiui et dedistis michi bibere; In matutino laudibus\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. Antiphone:\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Saulus autem intrauit ad principes\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can 204557); \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Accepta potestate ibat per uiam\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can 200067); \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Uenit uox de celo cum luce\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can 205140); \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Respondit miles qui es tu\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can 204279); \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Surge ait dom\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [inus] (Can 204813); Capitulum: Act 9,22: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Saulus autem\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [...]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 magis conualescebat et confundebat iudaeos qui hab\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [itaba]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 nt damasci affirmans quoniam hic est Christus\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ; Antiphon:\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Cum autem complacuit\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can 001984); [...] II. \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 V\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (igiliis)\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Iurauit dominus cum reliquis\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can 003522); Responsorium: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Magnus sanctus\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [...] (Can 007123); \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (1v) [Teil zu Purificatio Mariae.] Antiphon:\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Senex puerum portabat\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can 004864); Oratio.\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Erudi quesumus domine plebem tuam\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ; Invitatorium. \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 E\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [cce u]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 enit ad templum\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can 001072); \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 III\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 in Nocturno\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. Antiphon:\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Benedicta\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [tu in] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 mulieribus\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can 001709); Verweis auf Psalm 8: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Domine dominus noster\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ; Antiphon: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Speciosa facta\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can 004988); Psalm: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Celi enarrant\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ; Antiphon:\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Sicut mirra electa odorem\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can 004942); Lectio prima aus Ps. Augustinus: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Sermo in purificatione Sanctae Mariae\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (PL 95, 141-163): \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Hodiernus dies magnum nobis contulit gaudium in quo Christus infans in templo est praesentatus\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20...-... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 ad regnum celorum perueniunt et perueniunt et indue\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ; Responsorium:\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Adorna thalamum tuum\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can 006051); Versus: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Accipiens Symeon puerum\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can 006051a); Lectio aus Homilia de sanctis, Homilia VIII. \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 In purificatione sanctae Mariae\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (PL 95 1461C): \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Sancta Anna in uirginitate sua septem annis uixerat cum\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [vi]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 ro suo quo defuncto\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20...-... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 expectabat infanciam saluatoris ut paruu\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [m], bricht ab.}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;} \uc1 \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs20 Medizinischer Text auf der Basis von Aulus Cornelius Celsus: De medicina mit Erweiterungen von Isaak ben Salomon Israeli, Viaticum und weiteren Rezepten\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. Abschnitte \u252 \'fcber: De pareotidis, De androgis, de furunculo, de chiromio etc. Erkl\u228 \'e4rung der Krankheit und Rezepte f\u252 \'fcr Heilung. Zitierte Praxagoras und Ysaac. [134b obere H\u228 \'e4lfte, 134c untere H\u228 \'e4lfte von einem Doppelblatt; 134a obere H\u228 \'e4lfte, Fragm. lat. 31 untere H\u228 \'e4lfte von einem Doppelblatt; beide Doppelbl\u228 \'e4tter waren wohl die mittleren Doppelbl\u228 \'e4tter der Lage, wobei das Doppelblatt mit Fragm. lat. 134b und 134c das innere war]. \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (1r 134c) De chiromio praxagoras. \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Chiromium\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (f\u252 \'fcr chironeum)\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 ulcus est habens horas duras callosas tumentes emittens sanies sed tenu est odor malus nec mulcem nec in eius est humore\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20... (Cf. Celsus 5,28,5 - http://www.perseus.tufts.edu/hopper/text?doc=Perseus%3Atext%3A1999.02.0141%3Abook%3D5%3Achapter%3D28) (1v-134b) Rubrik \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 De pareotidis, Pateotides aliquantum secunda ualetudine aliquantum post febres longas illic sub auribus solent oriri\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [...] \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (1v-134c-2r-134b) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 De cancrenis\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (f\u252 \'fcr gangrenis) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 praxagoras. Zitate: \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (1rb) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 C\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ur)\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 a Egi\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (di)\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 us ad colicam.\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [A]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 d colicam dieta eius sic talis. utatur pane qui teneat aliquid furfuris bene fermentato et salito recenti unius uel duorum dierum sed uero calido uel fiat panis de spelta et in principio sue comestionis comedat de ipso unum fructum cum modico allio \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20... \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (1vb) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Ad inflationem matricis\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. R. interdum pillulas\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (?) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 aromaticas praemissa dig\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (esti)\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 one cum oximelle conposito et decoctatione \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Ad guttam rosaceam experimentum optimum et infallibile \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 \u8230 \'85\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 et ponantur iuxta ignem et statim q\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (uondam)\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 incipiet bullire remoueatur et semper ducam cum baculo dones infrigdetur. Drittel 13. Jh. \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 Lokalisierung: Italien \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 rubriziert (Lombarden und rote \u220 \'dcberschriften) \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 Buchschmuck: Feldinitiale \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 Bemerkungen zum Buchschmuck: T-Initiale - eine {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5270[0]/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Tierinitiale}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, die vor ein gerahmtes Feld gesetzt ist. Ein Drache bildet mit seinem K\u246 \'f6rper den Bogen des runden T. Sein Schwanz l\u228 \'e4uft in einer Spiralranke mit Blattbesatz aus und f\u252 \'fcllt damit das Binnenfeld der Initiale, deren Grund mit Blattgold versehen ist. Die Initiale sticht vor allem durch ihre Farbigkeit (blaugraue und violette Deckfarben) hervor, die sich vom restlichen rot-blauen Buchschmuck des Fragments abhebt. Fleuronn\u233 \'e9 am unteren Rand in Form eines Fleuronn\u233 \'e9-Stabs am unteren Rand, der von einer stilisierten Maske ausgeht. Er verl\u228 \'e4uft in Serpentinen und das Motiv enth\u228 \'e4lt mittig ein Fantasietier. Die Farbgestaltung findet sich auch in abwechselnd roten und blauen Lombarden wieder. \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs20 3. Bemerkungen \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Geschenk von Antiquar Curt Seidel 1931 (Zugangsnr: 31 D 1002) }

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;} \uc1 \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs20 Eberhard Schleusinger: De cometis\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Ausz\u252 \'fcge). \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (1r) Cap. 11 von\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Avicenna\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Aer est elementum nostrorum corporum et spiritum\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 bis \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 que faciunt necessarium esse illud\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. Abschlie\u223 \'dfend statt das Ende des Kapitels kommt ein Satz aus cap. 13: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Constat itaque ex dictis ... alternationes aeris et aliorum elementorum\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ; \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (1r-v) Cap. 16: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Quomodo effectus supercelestium et applicationes astrorum durant multum annis de post. Capitulum duodecimum. Longissimo quoque tempore post astrorum configurationes\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 bis\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 per constellationem prefigurata conpleatur\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. Abschlie\u223 \'dfend statt das Ende des Kapitels kommt ein Satz aus cap. 18: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Unde effectus tales longissimo tempore continuari possunt ut apparet in multis sectis. Talia\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [bricht ab]. Edition: Eberhard Schleusinger: De cometis - Traktat \u252 \'fcber den kometen von 1472, hg. von Peter Stotz und Philipp Roelli, Z\u252 \'fcrich 2012 [http://www.zora.uzh.ch/69827/].}

Uere\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. (nicht bei Cantus); Responsorium: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Salue nobilis uirga iesse de qua ortus est precandens lilium quod generauit dei filium\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (\u228 \'e4hnlich zu Can 007564); \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (1v) Versus: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Odor cuius fracilat super ungenta pretiosa fauum cum melle distillat lingua eius graciosa. {\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f2\fnil\fcharset0 Calibri;}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red204\green238\blue221;\red224\green224\blue224;} \uc1 \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs20 Missale\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Teile f\u252 \'fcr: Fer. 5-6 Hebd. 1 Quad., Fer. 6 Hebd. 2 Quad., Sabb. Hebd. 2 Quad. und Fer. 2-3 Hebd. 4 Quad.) \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (174a,1) (1r) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Super populum. Danobis misericoes deus ut sancta tua quibus incessanter explemur sinseris\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 \u8230 \'85 . [Fer. 2 Hebd. 4 Quad.]: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Feria Secunda. Deus in nomine tuo saluum me\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can g00811); Ps-versus 53,5 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Quoniam alieni insurrexerunt in me\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ; Oratio. \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Praesta quaesumus omnipotens deus ut obseruationes sacras annua deiotione recolentes\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 \u8230 \'85; \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (1r-v) 1Rg 3,16-28: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Lectio libri Regum. In diebus illis. Venerunt due mulieres meretrices\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 \u8230 \'85-\u8230 \'85\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 ad faciendum iudicium\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. Gradual: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Esto michi in deum\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can g01168); Gr-Versus: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Deus in te\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [spe]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 raui\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can g01168a); \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (1v-2r) Lectio aus Io 2,13-25 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Secundum Iiohannem. In il\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [lo]. \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Prope erat pascha iudeorum\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20...-\u8230 \'85 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 sciebat quis esst in homine\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [Textverlust Io 2,20-24];\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Feria tercia\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. Invitatorium:\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Exaudi deus orationem meam\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can g00785); Lectio aus Ex 32,7-14: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Lectio libri Exodi. In diebus illis. Locutus est dominus ad\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [Moysen] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 disens. Descende de monte\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 \u8230 \'85-\u8230 \'85 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 quod locutus fuerat et misertus est populo nostro dominus deus noster\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [Textverlust Ex 32,11-13]. Gradual: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Exurge domine fer opem\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can g00786); Gr-Versus:\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Deus auribus nostris\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can g00786a); Lectio aus Io 7,14-24: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Secundum Iohannem. In illo tempore. Iam die festo mediante\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 \u8230 \'85-\u8230 \'85 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 sed iustum iudicium iudicate\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (174a,2) (1r) [Fer. 5 Hebd. 1 Quad.:] Lectio aus Io 8,43-47 von \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Quare loquelam mean non cognoscitis\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 bis \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 qui est ex deo uerba dei audit\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Io 8,43-47); Offertorium. \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Inmittit angelus domini\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can g01204); \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Secreta. Sacrificia domine quaesumus ista nos saluent\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20... ; \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Communio: Panis quem ego\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can g01211); \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Complenda. Quorum nos domine largitate donorum\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20... ; \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Super populum. Deus domine populis christinis et que\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20... ; \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Feria sexta. De\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [\u8230 \'85]; \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Oratio: Esto domine propiteus\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [...]; \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (1r-v) Lectio aus Ez 18,20-28 Ezechiel prophete. \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Hec dicit dominus deus. Anima que peccauerit\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [...] \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (1v) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 eius quas operatus est bis suis quas operatus estuvita uiuet et non morietur\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ; \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (1v) Gradual: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Saluum fac seruum tuum deus meus\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can g00702); Lectio aus Io 5,1-5: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Secundum Iohannem. In illo. Erat dies festus iudeorum et ascendit Ihesus\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 bis \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 explectantium aqu\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [ae] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 motum\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [...]; \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (2r) [Fer. 6 Hebd. 2 Quad.:] Lectio: Gn 37,14-22 von \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 et uide si cuncta prospera sint erga\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 bis \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 et reddere patri suo\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ; Gradual\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Ad dominum tribularer clamaui\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can g01134); \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (2r-v) Lectio: [\u8230 \'85]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Matheum. In Illo. Dixit dominus ihesus turbis iudeorum. Homo\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [erat] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 pater familias qui plantauit\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Mt 21,33-46); \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (2v) Offertorium. \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Domine in auxilium\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can g02305); \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Secreta. Hec in nobis sacrificia deus et actione per maneant et operatione firmentur ; Communio. Tu domine seruabis\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can g00741); \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Fac nos domine quaesumus accepto pignore\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20... ; \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Super populum. Da quaesumus domine populo tuo salutem mentis\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20... . [Sabb. Hebd. 2 Quad.]. Sabbato.\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Introitus: Lex domini inreprehensibilis\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can g00742); \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Celi enarrant gloriam die\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Can 501007a); \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Oratio. Da quaesumus domine nostris effectum\u8230 \'85 tran\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [seat] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 animarum. Per dominum\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ; Lectio libri Genesis [bricht ab].}

[M]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 aiestatem tuam domine suppliciter exoramus\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20...-... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 sit pro nobis perpeus intercessor. per\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ; \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (1ra-1vb) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Gregorius Magnus: Homilia in evangelia, XIII\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [B]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 eati sunt serui illi quos cum uenerit dominus inuenerit uigilantes \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Lc. 12,37). \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Uigilat qui ad aspectum ueri luminis mentis occulos apertos tenet\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 bis\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 hoc autem scitote, quia si sciret paterfamilias\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. (Edition CCSL 141) \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (2rb-2vb) Lectio Io 20,19-31 [I]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 n illo tempore Cum esset sero die illo una sabbatorum\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 bis\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 ut credentes uitam eternam habeantis in nomine eius\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (2vb) Oratio: [P]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 raesta quaesumus omnipotens deus\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [ut] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 qui paschalia festa peregimus\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [hae]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 c te largiente moribus et uita\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [tenea]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 mus et famulos per dominum nostrum. \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (2vb) Beda Venerabilis: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Homeliarum evangelii\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Lib. {\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red204\green238\blue221;} \uc1 \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6922/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Unidentifizierter Text im Bereich der Philosophie / Ethik}} \par \pard\fi-705\li705\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Zitate: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 prudentie vero partes sunt tres memoria intelligentia prudentia\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (nach Cicero); Rubrik \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 de vitiis finitimis virtutibus\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 omnia item\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (?)\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 contraria rerum bonarum in rebus uitandis reponentur\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 tendunt sunt aiunt\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [...] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 gloria dignitas amplitudo amicicia defessum terminatione at per hoc perpetuum quod i qui cursus est uero nomine sempiternitas a perpetuitate est enim perpetuitas\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 succedentium sed morarum interminata\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 virtus prudentia est at\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (?) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 rerum bonarum et malarum utraque\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (?) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 scientia\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [...]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 iustitie et fortitudinis in donum fortitudinem\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Zitat aus Anselm: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Ennarationes in Matthaeum\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, cap. V: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 ideo nostra\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (?) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 iustitia non dicitur iustitia sed desiderium iustitiae\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (?) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 sicut pitagoras qui sapientiam hominum uocauit non sopiam sed philosophiam\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20..\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20. inperfecta sed enim\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [...] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 desiderium in celo perfectam\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [...] (PL 162, 1286D-1287A).}
